sections.name: Zridi
sections.text: This creature did not include a description.

traits.name: Unique
traits.text: A rules element with this trait is one-of-a-kind. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to creatures with this trait is increased by 10.

traits.name: Evil
traits.text: Evil effects often manipulate energy from evil-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to good divine servants or divine servants of good deities. A creature with this trait is evil in alignment.

traits.name: Medium
traits.text: *Space:* 5 feet, *Reach (Tall):* 5 feet, *Reach (Long):* 5 feet

traits.name: Div
traits.text: Divs are a family of fiends spawned from the spirits of evil genies within the desolation of Abaddon. Most divs are neutral evil. They typically have greater darkvision and weakness to cold iron and good damage.

traits.name: Fiend
traits.text: Creatures that hail from or have a strong connection to the evil-aligned planes are called fiends. Fiends can survive the basic environmental effects of planes in the Outer Sphere.

modifiers.name: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

automatic_abilities.name: Hatred of Red
automatic_abilities.text: Pairakas hate the color red. Zridi won't wear the color or willingly enter any place painted red. Given a choice, she'll attack a creature wearing red first. If barred from expressing her displeasure toward the color by force or some magical effect, she takes 2d6 mental damage at the end of her turn.

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

traits.name: Evil
traits.text: Evil effects often manipulate energy from evil-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to good divine servants or divine servants of good deities. A creature with this trait is evil in alignment.

traits.name: Finesse
traits.text: You can use your Dexterity modifier instead of your Strength modifier on attack rolls using this melee weapon. You still use your Strength modifier when calculating damage.

traits.name: Magical
traits.text:
Something with the magical trait is imbued with magical energies not tied to a specific tradition of magic. A magical item radiates a magic aura infused with its dominant school of magic.  
  
 Some items or effects are closely tied to a particular tradition of magic. In these cases, the item has the arcane, divine, occult, or primal trait instead of the magical trait. Any of these traits indicate that the item is magical.

affliction.name: Bubonic Plague

traits.name: Disease
traits.text: An effect with this trait applies one or more diseases. A disease is typically an affliction.

affliction.context: A creature can't remove the fatigued condition while infected.

stages.name: Stage 3
stages.text: enfeebled 3, fatigued, and take 1d6 persistent bleed damage every 1d20 minutes (1 day)

ability.name: Change Shape

traits.name: Divine
traits.text: This magic comes from the divine tradition, drawing power from deities or similar sources. Anything with this trait is magical.

traits.name: Concentrate
traits.text: An action with this trait requires a degree of mental concentration and discipline.

traits.name: Polymorph
traits.text:
These effects transform the target into a new form. A target can't be under the effect of more than one polymorph effect at a time. If it comes under the effect of a second polymorph effect, the second polymorph effect attempts to counteract the first. If it succeeds, it takes effect, and if it fails, the spell has no effect on that target. Any Strikes specifically granted by a polymorph effect are magical. Unless otherwise stated, polymorph spells don't allow the target to take on the appearance of a specific individual creature, but rather just a generic creature of a general type or ancestry.  
  
 If you take on a battle form with a polymorph spell, the special statistics can be adjusted only by circumstance bonuses, status bonuses, and penalties. Unless otherwise noted, the battle form prevents you from casting spells, speaking, and using most manipulate actions that require hands. (If there's doubt about whether you can use an action, the GM decides.) Your gear is absorbed into you; the constant abilities of your gear still function, but you can't activate any items.

traits.name: Transmutation
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the transmutation school of magic, typically changing something’s form.

ability.text: Zridi can take the appearance of any Small or Medium humanoid or animal. This doesn't change her Speed or her attack and damage modifiers with the Strikes, but it might change the damage type her Strikes deal.

ability.name: Compelled Performance

traits.name: Divine
traits.text: This magic comes from the divine tradition, drawing power from deities or similar sources. Anything with this trait is magical.

traits.name: Emotion
traits.text: This effect alters a creature's emotions. Effects with this trait always have the mental trait as well. Creatures with special training or that have mechanical or artificial intelligence are immune to emotion effects.

traits.name: Enchantment
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the enchantment school of magic, typically involving mind control, emotion alteration, and other mental effects.

traits.name: Mental
traits.text: A mental effect can alter the target's mind. It has no effect on an object or a mindless creature.

ability.effect: Zridi grants the target a +2 status bonus to Performance checks for one week. The target must attempt a DC 26 Will save.
ability.success: The target must Perform for 1 action on its next turn.
ability.failure: The target must Perform for 3 actions on its next turn, undertaking a Performance task set by Zridi.
ability.critical_failure: As failure, but Zridi can choose to delay the effect and trigger it at any point in the next week as a reaction.

ability.name: Tormenting Dreams

traits.name: Divine
traits.text: This magic comes from the divine tradition, drawing power from deities or similar sources. Anything with this trait is magical.

traits.name: Emotion
traits.text: This effect alters a creature's emotions. Effects with this trait always have the mental trait as well. Creatures with special training or that have mechanical or artificial intelligence are immune to emotion effects.

traits.name: Enchantment
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the enchantment school of magic, typically involving mind control, emotion alteration, and other mental effects.

traits.name: Mental
traits.text: A mental effect can alter the target's mind. It has no effect on an object or a mindless creature.

ability.effect: Zridi torments a sleeping creature within 100 feet with visions of betrayals by loved ones and friends. The target must attempt a DC 26 Will save, with the effects of the *nightmare* spell.
